thread.title: clean 3 star hotel
thread.title_full: clean 3 star hotel - Review of Hotel Nord Nuova Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: sam n
title: clean 3 star hotel
text:
I was stay here in March. Near to Termini just 5 min walk. Is is near to attractions by 20 min walk. Hop on Hop off buses are around the corner. Breakfast was good both in quality and quantity. Poor wifi but clean room and bed. Also be careful about pickpockets around Termini specially at night.
Room Tip: not to get rooms face to street. Voice of lots of Ambulance may bother you See more room tips
